casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Maurice L. STROUD 118P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Mr. Maurice L. Stroud, for Stroud, Maurice L. Ms. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of April 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
